modName: Lost Books of Voryn Dreleth and other obscure texts
summary: Little is known of the scholar Voryn Dreleth, yet his volumes survive still, scattered across the land. These rare volumes can be found in likely places, if you know where to look....
descriptionHtml:
Little is known of the scholar Voryn Dreleth, yet his volumes survive still, scattered across the land.
These rare volumes can be found in likely places, if you know where to look....

[color=#ffff99][b]Works by Voryn Dreleth:[/b][/color] (can be added to if this mod gets good feedback)
Dwemer Tonal Architecture
The Political Destabilization of Morrowind During the Nerevarine
Gray Book of the Council of Dawn and Dusk
The Complete Spellsword
Letter to Master Neloth (Daedric & Cyrodilic)
Letter to Brelyna Meryon (Daedric & Cyrodilic)
Letter to Jarl Elisef
Letter to Legate Rikke
Letter to Karliah
Letter to Maven Black-Briar

[color=#ffff99][b]Books by Michael Kirkbride:[/b][/color]
Eight Aedra Eat the Dreamer
Five Hundred Mighty Companions or Thereabouts
Histories of Strange Pre-Marriage
How Beautiful You Are
Lord Vivec's Sword Meeting
Seven Fights of the Aldudagga (1-4,6)
Shor Son of Shor
Source of Chaos
Tsaesci Creation Myth
Type of Zero Still to be Discovered
Vehk's Teaching
Water Getting Girl and the Inverse Tiger
Where Were You When The Dragon Broke

[color=#ffff99][b]Credits:[/b][/color]
Voryn Dreleth - texts written by Michael Butchin, who requested this mod.
Images supplied by Michael Butchin, tweaked by me in Photoshop
Michael Kirkbride - texts supplied by Kohdi

Please ENDORSE if you like! :)

[color=#ffff99][b]Locations:[/b][/color] check video and images
Wait, a minute, this is in the "treasure hunt" category! I can't tell you every location!
(But if you REALLY want help, see the CHEATERS GUIDE, aka, ReadMe, far right tab)
author: Anduniel and Michael
